src:
5 Pegulat Kabupaten Malang Raih Tiket PON 2020
07 Nov 2019, 14:42 by Sunarka Spt


5 Pegulat Kabupaten Malang Raih Tiket PON 2020

KBRN, Malang: Kontingen Persatuan Gulat Seluruh Indonesia ( PGSI ) Jawa Timur berhasil tampil sebagai juara umum pada Kejurnas Gulat babak Kualifikasi PON XX tahun 2019 yang berlangsung  tanggal 1 hingga 5  November 2019 di Jakarta.
Gelar juara umum tersebut diraih setelah para pegulat Jawa Timur mampu mengoleksi 6 medali emas, 5 medali perak dan 5 medali perunggu.
Sulastiman Binpres, PGSI Jawa Timur mengabarkan, dari 18 atlit yang di ikutsertakan, masih di dominasi para pegulat dari kabupaten Malang.
”Alhamdulilah Jawa Timur sangat membanggakan selama ini, dari berbagai event alhamdulilah peringkat satu,” tegas Sulastiman kepada RRI, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Menurut Sulastiman, lima pegulat Kabupaten Malang menyumbangkan 2 emas, satu perak dan 2 perunggu sekaligus mendapat tiket PON XX di Papua tahun 2020 mendatang. Dari 18 atlit gulat kontingen Jawa Timur,, 5 diantaranya atlit dari Kabupaten Malang.
“Untuk Jawa Timur masih di dominasi atlit dari kabupaten Malang, karena atlitnya yang memberikan kontribusi ke- Jawa Timur sejumlah 5 atlit, dan alhamdulilah dari 18 itu, 5 atlit dari kabupaten Malang dan alhamdulilah semuanya lolos untuk tiket PON 2020,” tegas dia.
Iya menambahkan, 5 pegulat dari kabupaten Malang masing-masing, Agus Fajar peraih medali emas  kelas Grego 85 kilogram, Faradisa Septi medali emas di kelas  76 kilogram , Sintia eka Arfenda  medali perak kelas  62 kilogram, Mutiara Ayuningtyas medali perunggu kelas 58 kilogram dan  Iin Wijayanti medali  perunggu di kelas 52 kilogram.
Untuk diketahui, posisi juara umum  kedua ditempati kontingen dari kalimantan timur dengan  5 medali emas, tiga perak dan 6 medali perunggu. Sdangkan juara umum tiga ditempati kontingen jawa barat dengan torehan 2 medali emas, 3 medali perak dan 4 medali perunggu.
text:
5 Malang Regency Wrestlers Wins PON 2020 Ticket
Nov 07 2019, 14:42 by Sunarka Spt


5 Malang Regency Wrestlers Wins PON 2020 Ticket

KBRN, Malang: The East Indonesian Wrestling Association (PGSI) Contingent of East Java successfully emerged as the overall champion in the Wrestling Championship PON XX Qualification round 2019 which took place from 1 to 5 November 2019 in Jakarta.
The overall championship title was won after the East Java wrestlers were able to collect 6 gold medals, 5 silver medals and 5 bronze medals.
Sulastiman Binpres, PGSI East Java reported, from 18 athletes that were included, it was still dominated by wrestlers from Malang regency.
"Thank God, East Java has been very proud so far, from a variety of events thank God ranked number one," said Sulastiman to RRI, Thursday (11/07/2019).
According to Sulastiman, five Malang Regency wrestlers donated 2 gold, one silver and 2 bronze as well as getting a PON XX ticket in Papua in 2020. Out of 18 East Java contingent wrestling athletes, 5 of them were athletes from Malang Regency.
"For East Java, it is still dominated by athletes from Malang regency, because the athletes who contributed to East Java were 5 athletes, and thank God from the 18, 5 athletes from Malang regency and thank God all of them passed for the PON 2020 ticket," he said.
Iya added, 5 wrestlers from Malang regency respectively, Agus Fajar who won the Grego 85 kilograms gold medal, Faradisa Septi gold medals in the 76 kilograms class, Sintia eka Arfenda silver medal 62 62 kilograms, Mutiara Ayuningtyas 58 kilograms bronze medal and Iin Wijayanti bronze medal in the class of 52 kilograms.
To note, the position of the second overall champion was occupied by a contingent from East Kalimantan with 5 gold medals, three silver medals and 6 bronze medals. While the three general champions are occupied by the West Java contingent with nicks of 2 gold medals, 3 silver medals and 4 bronze medals.
